aboutMe: Hello everyone! I'm Leandro Daniel Schugurensky, I'm 23 years old and have experience in administrative roles. I excel in technological tasks and as a Front-End programmer, specializing in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, TailwindCSS, Git, and GitHub. I also have experience in handling databases like MongoDB and Firebase.

I am committed to continuous learning and constantly improving my skills as a developer. My goal is to keep growing professionally in the field of web development, contributing my knowledge and skills to create robust and efficient web applications.
If you are looking for a committed and enthusiastic developer for your team, feel free to contact me.

workExperience.title: Administrative
workExperience.company: Subsecretariat of the Family of the Municipality of the City of Corrientes
description: Work placement (8 months) under the E.T.P (Work Training Program). Administrative tasks: loading and digitization of records, database entry, among others.

textContact: Are you looking for someone with skills and experience for a new project or position? I'm available for new opportunities and would love to hear about your proposal. If you think my profile fits what you need, feel free to get in touch. Please fill out the form below, and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.
